## CustomizableMultipleOption interface

CustomizableMultipleOption contains information about a multiselect that is defined as part of a customizable option.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CustomizableMultipleOption extends CustomizableOptionInterface 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [CustomizableOptionInterface](./magento-api.customizableoptioninterface.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [option\_id?](./magento-api.customizablemultipleoption.option_id.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Option ID. |
|  [required?](./magento-api.customizablemultipleoption.required.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Boolean'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates whether the option is required. |
|  [sort\_order?](./magento-api.customizablemultipleoption.sort_order.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The order in which the option is displayed. |
|  [title?](./magento-api.customizablemultipleoption.title.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The display name for this option. |
|  [uid](./magento-api.customizablemultipleoption.uid.md) | Scalars\['ID'\] | The unique ID for a <code>CustomizableOptionInterface</code> object. |
|  [value?](./magento-api.customizablemultipleoption.value.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[CustomizableMultipleValue](./magento-api.customizablemultiplevalue.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> An array that defines the set of options for a multiselect. |
